1 = ON
0 = OFF

00000 = A
00001 = B
00010 = C
.
.
.

------------------------------------
00100100	N
00000000	U
01001100	M
00110000	B
00000001	E
01111011	R
01111001	D
00000001	E
01101101	C
00100000	O
01111001	D
00000001	E
01111011	R
00110011	I
00100100	N
00110000	B
01111011	R
00000001	E
01111110	A
01111001	D
00110000	B
00100000	O
01111110	A
01111011	R
01111001	D

SCTF{NUMBERDECODERINBREADBOARD}
